text:
Bollywood and it’s obsession with remakes isn’t going to fade away anytime soon. Not only the song like Yeh Jawani from SOTY 2 are remixed/remade, but even for movies, the same story is sold in a new bottle all over again.
onlookersmedia
Now, popular and hit Tamil movie Kanchana 2 is being remade in Hindi. While Akshay Kumar will play the lead role in it, Kiara Advani has also been roped in for a prominent role. And according to the latest buzz, Amitabh Bachchan is also a part of the movie, and this time he is playing quite a different role.

If a report in India Today is to be believed, Amitabh Bachchan has been roped in to play the role of a transgender in the movie. Given the fact that Big B has nailed distinct roles like Paa in the past, we’re sure he will ace this one as well.
YouTube
In the Tamil version of the movie, Sarathkumar has played the role of a transgender named Kanchana. In the film, it is said, that Akshay Kumar's character is possessed by a ghost. The film, tentatively titled Laxmi, will not be totally similar to the original though.
title: Amitabh Bachchan Will Reportedly Play A Transgender In His Next Film Starring Akshay Kumar!
description: Now, popular and hit Tamil movie Kanchana 2 is being remade in Hindi. While Akshay Kumar will play the lead role in it, Kiara Advani has also been roped in for a prominent role.
